title: RP not received for the Star Guardian Contest
body:
Hey folks,

I made a support ticket about this and was instructed to post here instead.

Me and my team got S+ and have still not received the 1000RP for doing so.

The summoners involved were: 
Byte 
Hang 
Aizenta 
kobeblue 
Kàrma Police

I was the person who submitted with in-game name 'Byte'.

We submitted our entry 1 hour before the 5PM deadline AEST and the Google Doc submitted successfully.

This is the image we submitted as well:
https://i.imgur.com/KX0zlLo.jpg

Thanks!

replies.body:
Greetings Byte, thank you for this info.

The reason you didn't get your RP yet was due to an issue on our end, the spreadsheet we were using for one reason or another had the timezone set 2 hours ahead. We are doing a second wave of RP distribution shortly catching all the summoners that should have gotten RP within the correct time frame though.

I do apologise for this but I hope you enjoyed the contest! If you have any further questions let me know.

~Elam

> [{quoted}](name=LGC Elam,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=7PQAGMe6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-27T01:35:13.905+0000)
>
> Greetings Byte, thank you for this info.
> 
> The reason you didn't get your RP yet was due to an issue on our end, the spreadsheet we were using for one reason or another had the timezone set 2 hours ahead. We are doing a second wave of RP distribution shortly catching all the summoners that should have gotten RP within the correct time frame though.
> 
> I do apologise for this but I hope you enjoyed the contest! If you have any further questions let me know.
> 
> ~Elam

Hey, good to know! Thanks heaps.
